main event: An observer in Brooklyn, New York, sighted a silvery colored object with white revolving lights and a red light on top in July 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported to have no sound,The observer indicated some characteristics resembling lightning, including its brightness and lack of solid structure,The object appeared suddenly and could be seen intermittently,The observer had prior sightings of similar objects on June 17, 1967,The report was not successfully followed up by the Air Force due to insufficient details.
sighted object: a silvery colored object with white revolving lights and a red light on top
witness description: The witness is a 19-year-old male who expressed an interest in meteor observations.
